name: Timberland Jayne Fabric and Leather Waterproof Side Zip Boots - Women's
categories: Jayne Fabric and Leather Waterproof Side Zip
description:
High-cuff desert boots, no laces needed. A side-zip adds a little convenience to this classic style. Crafted using sustainably minded materials, to date Timberland has re-purposed more 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.Uppers are leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group. Tanneries are assessed based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Upper fabric is ReBOTL recycled fabric that wicks moisture away from the foot.TimberDry™ waterproof breathable membrane is made from 50% post-consumer recycled material.Adjustable cuff strap and side zip.Supportive EVA footbed provides all day comfort.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.

        Sustainability
